name: Theos (VR, Music, Shooter)
description:
Theos is a virtual reality music shooter. Similar to games like Beat Saber and Pavlov.

Can you survive this hellish bunker? Can you not only survive but escape?  This game is a hardcore challenge that will test you. Only the skillful with fast reflexes will survive and win.

See if you can beat the game today for free!

Don't forget to leave feedback! I want to make a game that everyone can enjoy!

This game is free and will always be free thanks to our Paterons.  You guys are my heroes thanks so much!
